title: BRIEF-Alcatel-Lucent provides TIM with record distance microwave link
text:
BRIEF-Alcatel-Lucent provides TIM with record distance microwave link Sept 22 
Sept 22 Alcatel Lucent SA : 
* Provides TIM with record distance microwave link that will ensure continuous ultra-broadband connectivity between the Sicilian islands of Pantelleria and Lampedusa Source text: bit.ly/1KxznqM Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
